page.title: 10Barrow Hill
page.content: Barrow Hill is a village with few shops.It grew next to the railway line to house the workers in the local industries and collieries.The first thing I noticed was that many of the buildings were made of brick.There is a brickworks in the village,causing much traffic with lorries going to and fro.Staveley Works steel tube works is to the south of the village across the railway lines.There is a chemical works to the south west of the village and the local farmers are looking for telltale signs of pollution.In the village I noticed one small play area.
